description: A boy who is part of P.A.N.D.R.A. Kagari is a multipower esper, having abilities such as precog, psychokinesis, and pyrokinesis. He seems to be paired up on missions with Kazura often, considering her reactions towards her. In recent chapters, Kagari transferred into The Children`s class with other P.A.N.D.R.A. members as new students.
name: Hino Kagari
